practice_phrases.known: 我喜欢感觉好像我能说英语
practice_phrases.target: I like feeling as if I can speak English

practice_phrases.known: 我很喜欢感觉好像我快准备好要学习了
practice_phrases.target: I like feeling as if I am nearly ready to learn

practice_phrases.known: 我不喜欢感觉好像我不能轻松回答，因为我想说得很好
practice_phrases.target: I do not like feeling as if I can not answer easily, because I want to say it well
